original_text: None of the offenses they have committed will be remembered against them. Because of the righteous things they have done, they will live.
korean_text: 그 범죄한 것이 하나도 기억함이 되지 아니하리니 그가 행한 공의로 살리라

sentences.original_text: None of the offenses they have committed
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 저지른 죄 중 어느 것도

sentences.original_text: Because of the righteous things they have done
